value:
I quite like serving tea and cake. All
the little steps involved appeal to my
meticulous nature.

This reminds me of tea parties I used
to have with my professor. I recall
those occasions fondly...

I'm happy to play the role of server.
What could possibly go wrong? It's
not like there'll be ghosts or anything.

How much sugar do you want in your
tea? You can be honest—I won't
judge, $Nu.

Mmm...yes, that's very sweet. What?
Of course I'm not stealing. I was only
testing the cakes! For quality!

Hi there. I've brought you some tea
leaves—want to take a look? They're
from $Nf.

This tea party will go off without a
hitch, thanks to my efforts. You'll see.

Out of the way, please. I have snacks
to prepare for the tea party.

Ugh... To work so hard, and not see
the effort bear fruit...

Thank you very much. Here, I got you
a little treat to enjoy with your tea.

Lysithea von Ordelia, at your service.
Your snacks are my responsibility!

I have to admit, I didn't see the point
of me working a job like this at first.
It took time away from my studies.$k$pThe more I do it, though, the more
I realize that I'm actually learning
a lot. I'd say it's been worthwhile!$k$pServing people is hard work. For one
thing, it requires you to understand
them really well.$k$pYou have to anticipate their needs
by picking out and preparing teas
and snacks you think they'll like.$k$pThat means you have to be studious,
observant, and determined to give
everyone the best experience.$k$pSpeaking of—I've put together a little
selection for you. So, which of these
teas do you like best?
Time for tea!
Take a seat!
I'm pouring!
Piece of cake?
But the cake...
J-just because I'm serving doesn't mean I can't partake!
*gulp* I was only taking a sample! For analysis!
Knowing how to serve tea is a sign of maturity, I'll have you know.
So these cakes go here, and these biscuits go there... That means we'll have some left over.
I don't put any sugar in my tea. That's right—none at all.
Sipping tea, making small talk... It's kind of nice, actually.
Here. I saved some of the best sweets for you.
Your order?
Where do I sit?
Right away.
